title: Create /wp-add-skills command file
description: Implement commands/wp-add-skills.md with frontmatter, bash scripts, and documentation following the drupal-cleanup pattern. ~180 lines total.

title: Update plugin metadata
description: Update .claude-plugin/plugin.json: change description from '22 commands' to '23 commands'

title: Update test suite for wp-add-skills
description: Update tests/test-plugin.bats: change command count from 22 to 23, add 3 new tests for wp-add-skills

title: Create WordPress skills documentation
description: Create docs/wordpress-skills.md, update docs/commands/overview.md, docs/quick-start.md, zensical.toml, and CHANGELOG.md

title: Run verification tests
description: Run bats test suite to verify all 57 tests pass (was 54). Build documentation with zensical to catch any errors.

title: Phase A: Validate pre-flight checks (git, gh, terminus, circleci)
description: Verify all CLI tools are installed and authenticated: git, gh (GitHub CLI), terminus (Pantheon), circleci CLI. Run the agent through Gate 1 pre-flight validation.

title: Phase A: Validate git clone + GitHub repo creation for ucsf-siren-network
description: Clone Pantheon repo ssh://codeserver.dev.dc524cf2-19c7-40af-a5b4-842a85440736@codeserver.dev.dc524cf2-19c7-40af-a5b4-842a85440736.drush.in:2222/~/repository.git and create GitHub repo kanopi/ucsf-siren-network. Verify remote setup and initial push.

title: Phase A: Validate GitHub repo config (squash merge, team, branch protection)
description: Verify GitHub repo settings: squash merge only, kanopicode team access, branch protection rules on main. Run through Gate 2 validation.

title: Phase B: Validate Terminus auth and Pantheon services (Redis, New Relic, UUID)
description: Verify terminus auth:whoami succeeds, site UUID is captured correctly, Redis is enabled. Run steps 3.1-3.5 and Gate 3.

title: Phase B: Validate DDEV config creation (4.1a) — PHP/DB version detection
description: Verify ddev config creates correct .ddev/config.yaml with PHP version and database version detected from pantheon.yml or Pantheon API.

title: Phase B: Validate Kanopi DDEV add-on install (4.1b) — host commands exist
description: Verify ddev add-on install completes and host commands (project-configure, theme-build, etc.) exist in .ddev/commands/host/.

title: Phase B: Validate DDEV project-configure (4.1c) + Gate 3B — env vars, nginx, load-config.sh
description: Run ddev project-configure and validate Gate 3B: HOSTING_SITE correct, HOSTING_ENV set, THEME path valid (now blocking), load-config.sh exists, Solr addon if needed. Check nginx config placeholders.

title: Phase B: Validate ddev init (4.1d) + Gate 4A — composer, db-refresh, npm recovery
description: Run ddev init and verify all 9 sub-steps complete. Check Gate 4A: DDEV running, Drupal bootstrap (now blocking), database has content, npm modules installed. Test npm recovery if needed.

title: Phase B-FIX: Track DDEV-related agent changes discovered during testing
description: Collector issue for any AGENT.md changes needed based on Phase B testing results. Document what failed, what was changed, and why.

title: Phase C: Validate browser check (4.1e) — Chrome DevTools MCP
description: Verify browser check step works with Chrome DevTools MCP. Confirm agent proceeds to 4.1f even if browser check fails (non-blocking).

title: Phase C: Validate Redis/PAPC module install (4.1f) — decoupled from browser
description: Verify drush en redis, pantheon_advanced_page_cache works independently of browser check. Confirm modules install without errors.

title: Phase C: Validate Cypress test run (4.1g) — users, flood clear, system-checks
description: Verify Cypress setup: test users created via drush, flood table cleared to prevent lockout, system-checks test passes. Check ddev cypress-run output.

title: Phase C: Validate Solr conditional setup (4.1h)
description: If Solr was detected, verify Solr container is running, search_api module is configured, and Solr server connection works. If no Solr, verify step is skipped cleanly.

title: Phase D: Validate Composer deps and scripts (4.2)
description: Verify composer require adds all expected dev dependencies (coder, phpstan, rector, etc.) and scripts are added to composer.json.

title: Phase D: Validate config files and file operations (4.3-4.12)
description: Verify all config files are created/updated: .circleci/config.yml, phpstan.neon, rector.php, .twig-cs-fixer.php, .editorconfig, pantheon.yml, settings.php additions, Quicksilver scripts, Cypress configs.

title: Phase D: Validate modules, README, CLAUDE.md (4.13-4.15) + Gate 4B
description: Verify modules are enabled, README.md is updated, CLAUDE.md is generated. Run Gate 4B validation including new check 10 (no unreplaced placeholders in CircleCI config).

title: Phase D: Validate local browser check + commit (4.16-4.17)
description: Verify local site loads in browser via Chrome DevTools MCP, then commit all changes with proper commit message.

title: Phase D-FIX: Track code-change agent issues
description: Collector issue for any AGENT.md changes needed based on Phase D testing results. Document what failed, what was changed, and why.

title: Phase E: Validate branch push (5.1)
description: Verify git push -u origin feature/kanopi-devops succeeds and branch appears on remote.

title: Phase E: Validate CircleCI project creation (5.2) — manual + API poll with github/ slug
description: Verify user is prompted to create project via web UI. Verify API poll uses github/kanopi/{repo-name} (NOT gh/). Verify retry loop works (up to 6 attempts, 10s waits).

title: Phase E: Validate CircleCI settings API (5.3) — autocancel + pr_only_build
description: Verify PATCH calls to /settings endpoint succeed. Verify HTTP response codes are checked. If not 200, verify failure is recorded and added to manual follow-up.

title: Phase E: Validate CircleCI schedule creation (5.4) — verify response has ID
description: Verify POST to /schedule endpoint. Parse response JSON and confirm it contains an id field and name matches Automated Updates. If no id, verify failure message is generated.

title: Phase E: Validate PR creation + Gate 5 (5.5)
description: Verify PR is created via gh pr create. Run Gate 5: branch on remote, PR exists, commit on branch.

title: Phase E: Validate final checklist output (5.6)
description: Verify the final checklist is output with all completed items checked and any warnings/failures listed as manual follow-up items.

title: Phase E-FIX: Track CircleCI-related agent changes
description: Collector issue for any AGENT.md changes needed based on Phase E testing results. Document what failed (API slug format, settings API, schedule creation), what was changed, and why.
